name: Bowling for Colour
description:
Hi all!

This is Game #1 of a Game-A-Day self isolation challenge.
Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, the entirety of the UK is in self-isolation lockdown.
During this time, I have challenged myself to produce a small game each day.

Please enjoy this hideous colourful mess of a bowling game :)

Asset Sources

Bowling Pin:
https://opengameart.org/content/bowling-pin

Wood:
https://opengameart.org/content/simple-wood-background

Music:
https://opengameart.org/content/itchy

Pop Sound:
https://opengameart.org/content/bubbles-pop
